ISSUE.TITLE: Add Foreground and background text Color options as default in RichEditor
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Add Foreground and background Color options for text in RichEditor** Can we make this as **default option**? I spent a lot more time to figure this trick which I believe should be the default setting. Add this in settings for adminareasettings.richeditoradditionalsettings to settings.plugins.push('textcolor'); settings.toolbar += ' | forecolor backcolor'; Both Foreground and background color options show up in the editor :)
